code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MySavedEvents=()=>{const[savedEvents,setSavedEvents]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchSavedEvents=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const res=await axios.get('/api/saved-events/my-saved-events',{headers:{'Authorization':token}});setSavedEvents(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};fetchSavedEvents();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:savedEvents.map(savedEvent=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:savedEvent.Event.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:savedEvent.Event.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:savedEvent.Event.description})]},savedEvent.id))});};export default MySavedEvents;
